吧.english: particle indicating polite suggestion; | onomatopoeia | bar (serving drinks, providing internet access, etc.)

白.english: white; snowy; pure; bright; empty (Kangxi radical 106)

比.english: compare; (indicates comparison) (Kangxi radical 81); to gesticulate as one talks

别.english: don't do something; don't | depart; | other; difference; distinguish

次.english: (mw for number of times of occurrence); nth; order

错.english: mistake; error; blunder; miss an opportunity

对.english: correct; a pair; to face; be opposite; to; towards

过.english: to pass; to cross; go over; (indicates a past experience)

红.english: red; symbol of success; bonus; popular

就.english: then; at once; just; only; with regard to

考试.english: test; exam; to give or take a test

离.english: leave; depart; go away; apart from

两.english: two; 2; both; (unit of weight equal to 50 grams)

上班.english: go to work; be on duty

送.english: deliver; to carry; to give; send

题.english: topic; subject; question on a test or assignment

玩.english: to play; have a good time; visit; enjoy

往.english: to go (in a direction); towards; in the past

希望.english: to hope; wish for; to desire

要.english: to want; to need; will/shall; important

一下.english: a little bit/while; one time; once

阴.english: cloudy (weather); yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang); secret; the moon; negative; shade

右边.english: the right (as opposed to left) side

找.english: try to find; look for; seek; to give change

正在.english: in the process of (doing something); currently

走.english: to walk; to go; to move (Kangxi radical 156)
